alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 9:16PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LEA...NORTHWESTERN ECTOR...WESTERN ANDREWS...GAINES...WINKLER AND NORTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT/1015 PM MDT/... At 1016 PM CDT/916 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Bronco to 9 miles east of Hobbs to 19 miles north of Mentone. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Seminole, Kermit, Eunice, Seagraves, Jal, Seagraves Airport, Eunice Airport, Jal Airport, Nadine, Gaines County Airport, Loop, Florey, Slash Ranch, Bennett, Frankel City, Paynes Corner, Higginbotham, Gaines County Park, and Winkler County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
